{"tiddlers":{"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/icon":{"text":"<svg class='tc-image-led ic-image-button'height='22pt'width='22pt'viewBox='0 0 128 128'><path d='m 64 3 l 52 29 v 61 l -52 29 l -52 -29 v -61 l 52 -29 z'/>{{$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/template}}</svg>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/license":{"text":"This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.

It uses SVG animate elements to change attributes over a period of time.

This plugin comprises:

{fill:{{!!text-color}}!important;stroke:{{!!text-outline-color}};stroke-width:{{!!text-ouline-width}};}.tc-image-led {fill:#000;stroke:#ff0;stroke-width:5;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/stylesheet","text-outline-color":"#000","text-ouline-width":".1","text-color":"#fff","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","defs":"<defs><path id='f1'd='m0,0l3,3h6l3-3c0,0-1-1-3-1h-6c-2,0-3,1-3,1z'/><path id='f2'd='m0,0l3,3v7l-3,3c0,0-1-1-1-3v-7c0-2,1-3,1-3z'/><path id='f3'd='m0,0l-3,3v7l3,3c0,0,1-1,1-3v-7c0-2-1-3-1-3z'/><path id='f4'd='m0,0l8,0l2,2l-2,2l-8,0l-2-2z'/><path id='f5'd='m0,0l3-3h6l3,3c0,0-1,1-3,1h-6c-2,0-3-1-3-1z'/><g id='d0'><use x='4'y='69'href='#f5'/><use x='17'y='55'href='#f3'/><use id='c5'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d5'/></g><g id='c6'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d0'/></g><g id='c7'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d1'/></g><g id='c8'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d2'/></g><g id='c9'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d3'/></g><g id='c10'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d4'/></g><g id='b1'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d1'/></g><g id='b2'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d2'/></g><g id='b3'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d3'/></g><g id='b4'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d4'/></g><g id='b5'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d5'/></g><g id='b6'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d6'/></g><g id='b7'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d7'/></g><g id='b8'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d8'/></g><g id='b9'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d9'/></g><g id='b10'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d1'/><use x='18'y='0'href='#d0'/></g><g id='b11'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d1'/><use id='b15'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d3'/></g><g id='b16'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d4'/></g><g id='b17'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d5'/></g><g id='b18'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d6'/></g><g id='b19'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d7'/></g><g id='b20'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d8'/></g><g id='b21'><use x='18'y='0'href='#d9'/></g><g id='b22'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d1'/><use x='18'y='0'href='#d0'/></g><g id='b23'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d1'/><use x='18'y='0'href='#d1'/></g><g id='b24'><use x='0'y='0'href='#d1'/><use x='18'y='0'href='#d2'/></g></defs>","caption":"LED Clock"},"$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/template":{"text":"\define a()<svg class='tc-led'viewBox='0 36 134 36'fill='#000'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/stylesheet!!defs}}<g id='hours'><use x='0'y='0'><animate attributeName='href'values='#b$(h)$'dur='$(i0)$s'id='hoursten'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#b$(h)$'begin='hoursten.end'dur='$(h0)$s'id='hoursten2'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#b$(h1)$;#b$(h2)$;#b$(h3)$;#b$(h4)$;#b$(h5)$;#b$(h6)$;#b$(h7)$;#b$(h8)$;#b$(h9)$;#b$(h10)$;#b$(h11)$;#b$(h)$'begin='hoursten2.end'dur='12h'repeatCount='indefinite'/></use></g><g id='minutes'><use x='42'y='0'><animate attributeName='href'values='#c$(n0)$'dur='$(i0)$s'id='minutesten'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#c$(n0)$'begin='minutesten.end'dur='$(n6)$s'id='minutesten2'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#c$(n1)$;#c$(n2)$;#c$(n3)$;#c$(n4)$;#c$(n5)$;#c$(n0)$'begin='minutesten2.end'dur='60min'repeatCount='indefinite'/></use><use x='60'y='0'><animate attributeName='href'values='#d$(m0)$'dur='$(i0)$s'id='minutesone'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#d$(m0)$'begin='minutesone.end'dur='$(m10)$s'id='minutesone2'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#d$(m1)$;#d$(m2)$;#d$(m3)$;#d$(m4)$;#d$(m5)$;#d$(m6)$;#d$(m7)$;#d$(m8)$;#d$(m9)$;#d$(m0)$'begin='minutesone2.end'dur='10min'repeatCount='indefinite'/></use></g><g id='seconds'><use x='84'y='0'><animate attributeName='href'values='#c$(t0)$'dur='$(i0)$s'id='secondsten'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#c$(t0)$'begin='secondsten.end'dur='$(t6)$s'id='secondsten2'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#c$(t1)$;#c$(t2)$;#c$(t3)$;#c$(t4)$;#c$(t5)$;#c$(t0)$'begin='secondsten2.end'dur='60s'repeatCount='indefinite'/></use><use x='102'y='0'><animate attributeName='href'values='#d$(s0)$'dur='$(i0)$s'id='secondsone'/><animate attributeName='href'values='#d$(s0)$;#d$(s1)$;#d$(s2)$;#d$(s3)$;#d$(s4)$;#d$(s5)$;#d$(s6)$;#d$(s7)$;#d$(s8)$;#d$(s9)$'begin='secondsone.end'dur='10s'repeatCount='indefinite'/></use></g><g id='dots'><g><circle cx='82'cy='50'r='2'/><circle cx='82'cy='58'r='2'/></g><g><circle cx='40'cy='50'r='2'/><circle cx='40'cy='58'r='2'/></g></g></svg>
<$vars s=<<now '0ss'>> m=<<now '0mm'>> h=<<now 'hh12'>>><$vars h0={{{ [[59]subtract<m>multiply[60]add[59]subtract<s>] }}} h1={{{ [<h>add[1]] }}} h2={{{ [<h>add[2]] }}} h3={{{ [<h>add[3]] }}} h4={{{ [<h>add[4]] }}} h5={{{ [<h>add[5]] }}} h6={{{ [<h>add[6]] }}} h7={{{ [<h>add[7]] }}} h8={{{ [<h>add[8]] }}} h9={{{ [<h>add[9]] }}} h10={{{ [<h>add[10]] }}} h11={{{ [<h>add[11]] }}} h12={{{ [<h>add[12]] }}} i0='.555' n={{{ [<m>divide[10]trunc[]multiply[10]] }}} o={{{ [<m>divide[10]trunc[]] }}} t={{{ [<s>divide[10]trunc[]multiply[10]] }}} u={{{ [<s>divide[10]trunc[]] }}}><$vars m0={{{ [<m>subtract<n>] }}} m1={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[1]] }}} m2={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[2]] }}} m3={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[3]] }}} m4={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[4]] }}} m5={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[5]] }}} m6={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[6]] }}} m7={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[7]] }}} m8={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[8]] }}} m9={{{ [<m>subtract<n>add[9]] }}} m10={{{ [<s>subtract[59]negate[]] }}} n0={{{ [<o>add[0]] }}} n1={{{ [<o>add[1]] }}} n2={{{ [<o>add[2]] }}} n3={{{ [<o>add[3]] }}} n4={{{ [<o>add[4]] }}} n5={{{ [<o>add[5]] }}} n6={{{ [<n>subtract<m>add[9]multiply[60]add[59]subtract<s>] }}} s0={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[1]] }}} s1={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[2]] }}} s2={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[3]] }}} s3={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[4]] }}} s4={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[5]] }}} s5={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[6]] }}} s6={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[7]] }}} s7={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[8]] }}} s8={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[9]] }}} s9={{{ [<s>subtract<t>add[10]] }}} t0={{{ [<u>add[0]] }}} t1={{{ [<u>add[1]] }}} t2={{{ [<u>add[2]] }}} t3={{{ [<u>add[3]] }}} t4={{{ [<u>add[4]] }}} t5={{{ [<u>add[5]] }}} t6={{{ [<s>subtract<t>subtract[10]negate[]subtract[1]] }}}><<a>></$vars></$vars></$vars>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/ledclock/template","tags":""}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/ledclock
